masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "There's a villain with LASER EYES systematically destroying every Christmas decoration on Maple Street! He keeps yelling about 'light pollution' and 'aesthetic violations'! The Hendersons' inflatable Santa just EXPLODED! My prize-winning light display is NEXT!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the villain before he destroys more decorations
  • Protect the remaining displays
  • Figure out his real motivationâ€”is this about more than aesthetics?
